entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
